item.title: Virtualbox Modprobe Problem
item.description: After upgrading the Linux Kernel, my virtualbox cannot automatically load the kernel modules for virtualbox. Following is the steps for finding out the problems and solving them. Locating Problem I could manually modprobe the virtualbox driver, but failed to load at boot, so I first check the status of the systemd’s output. Checking the systemd’s modules load service status: # systemctl status systemd-modules-load.service ‚óè systemd-modules-load.service - Load Kernel Modules Loaded: loaded (/usr/lib/systemd/system/systemd-modules-load.
